page.title: 02General Description (cont)
page.content: above you like giants closing upon you.North Anston is{situated on a hill and at the{bottom of the hill}is South Anston.Dinnington is at the top of the hill it is relatively flat.{The {highest point}in our whole D_Block is {Windermere Court}where there used to be an old windmill.Dinnington is the {oldest settlement}in the area . { Approximately 11,000 people}live in our D_Block area.Some houses are old but most are{modern buildings.}The old houses are about{100 years}old.Most of the people that live in our D_Block work for the{NCB}or commute into larger towns .There are a{few farmers in the area too.There are several {churches and church halls.}There is no {entertainment}except bingo in the church hall,and occasional shows at the Lyric, Dinnington.There are two {recreation grounds.
